div.div: College of Wooster vs. Wash. & Jeff. Coll.

tr.td: WOOSTER WINS TOSS, ELECTS TO RECEIVE; W&J DEFENDS SOUTH GOAL.
Ted Ford kickoff 64 yards to the WOO01, Alex Woods return 19 yards to the WOO20 (Sal DeCario).
